$$
f(x) + f(-x) = \frac{(x+1)^2 + \sin x}{x^2+1} + \frac{((-x)+1)^2 + \sin(-x)}{(-x)^2+1}

$$
= \frac{(x+1)^2 + \sin x}{x^2+1} + \frac{(1-x)^2 - \sin x}{x^2+1}
$$

= \frac{(x+1)^2 + (1-x)^2}{x^2+1}
$$
